argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sectepi.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | sectepi.e | |- E = ( Epi ` C ) |
| 3 |  | sectepi.s | |- S = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 4 |  | sectepi.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 5 |  | sectepi.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | sectepi.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | episect.n | |- N = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 8 |  | episect.1 | |- ( ph -> F e. ( X E Y ) ) |
| 9 |  | episect.2 | |- ( ph -> F ( X S Y ) G ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppCat ` C ) = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 11 | 10, 1 | #P_oppcbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) = ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) = ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 14 | 10 | #P_oppccat | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( oppCat ` C ) e. Cat ) |
| 15 | 4, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( oppCat ` C ) e. Cat ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) = ( Inv ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 4, 12, 2 | #P_oppcmon | |- ( ph -> ( Y ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) X ) = ( X E Y ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 17 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> F e. ( Y ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) X ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 10, 4, 5, 6, 3, 13 | #P_oppcsect | |- ( ph -> ( G ( X ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) Y ) F <-> F ( X S Y ) G ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 19 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> G ( X ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) Y ) F ) |
| 21 | 11, 12, 13, 15, 6, 5, 16, 18, 20 | #P_monsect | |- ( ph -> F ( Y ( Inv ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) X ) G ) |
| 22 | 1, 10, 4, 6, 5, 7, 16 | #P_oppcinv | |- ( ph -> ( Y ( Inv ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) X ) = ( X N Y ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_breqd | |- ( ph -> ( F ( Y ( Inv ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) X ) G <-> F ( X N Y ) G ) ) |
| 24 | 21, 23 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> F ( X N Y ) G ) |
